results.content: This course serves well for the beginners who are interested to learn VueJs 3. It points in right directions to build the capability to start working on basic vue applications.! Quick and on point course!

results.content: This is a very good course if you have previous experience with another component-based JavaScript framework like React.

results.content: Just started the course and it's already exactly what I was looking for. Too many other courses are out of date and don't go at a good pace. I also want to support all content creators, don't look away because of how many reviews there are. I trust this instructor to carry us through the rest of the course as I get more comfortable with Vue 3. Merci Ivan!
